name: WaterdrippingSoundsforSleepandRelaxation
0:
”Alexa, open water dripping sounds”
”Alexa, pause”
”Alexa, resume”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: water dripping sounds
des:
Let the Water dripping sounds clear your mind and take you to a quiet place of reflection.

"Water dripping Sounds for Sleep and Relaxation" plays calming sound loops to help you fall asleep faster, sleep better, relax, meditate, or drown out distracting noises.

They work at the core level of the human system, DNA. The vibrations and frequencies of these powerful sounds have shown tremendous healing properties.

Just relax and feel the activation of different brain centers as you go deeper with sleep sound.

By default, the sound will play until you stop it. To pause the music, say "Alexa, pause.” To resume it again, say "Alexa, resume."

SHOW YOUR SUPPORT:

Your reviews and feedback are important to us! Please consider showing your support by writing a review for Sleep Sounds.

Note: The information in this skill is provided for informational and educational purposes only. It is not a substitute for professional medical advice, treatment or diagnosis. Call your doctor to receive medical advice. If you think you may have a medical emergency, please dial your local emergency response phone number.
